title: Multiple Hypothesis Based Particle Counting
description: A Python implementation of the algorithm detailed in DOI: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX, for detecting and counting nanoparticles in optical microscopy images. This package provides tools for automated particle detection, PSF estimation, and statistical analysis of experimental data.

creators.name: Neil. H. Kim
